# Valuecommerce

## Example

### Normal ad

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="valuecommerce"
  data-sid="3008"
  data-pid="884466614"
  data-vcptn="test"
>
</amp-ad>
```

### Omakase ad

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="valuecommerce"
  data-pid="884466614"
  data-vcptn="test"
  data-om="1"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration details and to generate your tags, please contact https://www.valuecommerce.ne.jp/info/
